  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/LukeHall" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">Luke Hall MP</a><span class="ProfileHeaderCard-badges"><a href="/help/verified" class="js-tooltip" target="_blank" title="Verified account" data-placement="right" rel="noopener"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></a></span>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/LukeHall">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">LukeHall</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">Member of Parliament for Thornbury and Yate.</p>

  <div class="trends-inner"><div class="flex-module trends-container context-trends-container">
  <div class="flex-module-header">
    
    <h3><span class="trend-location js-trend-location">Worldwide trends</span></h3>
  </div>
  <div class="flex-module-inner">
    <ul class="trend-items js-trends">
        <li class="trend-item js-trend-item  context-trend-item" data-trend-name="Arizona" data-trends-id="-7784732383306076250" data-trend-token=":location_request:entity_trend:taxi_worldwide_source:tweet_count_100000_1000000_metadescription:">

    <a class="pretty-link js-nav js-tooltip u-linkComplex " href="/search?q=Arizona&amp;src=tren" data-query-source="trend_click">

  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Our economy has grown for eight consecutive years, debt is beginning to fall, manufacturing is growing and disposable income p.person is now 4.4 per cent higher than 2010. We know from last time that Labours irresponsible promises lead to more debt, higher taxes and fewer jobs<a href="https://t.co/9GuE4DDm7D" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/9GuE4DDm7D</a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Without a strong economy we won't be able to fund the world class public services on which we all rely. This is what <a href="/AngelaRayner" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="222748037"><s>@</s><b>AngelaRayner</b></a> said earlier this year about Labour's approach to the economy. <a href="/hashtag/Marr?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Marr</b></a><a href="https://t.co/F4XgcXfmRr" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/F4XgcXfmRr</a></p>
</div>


      

      
            <div class="AdaptiveMediaOuterContainer">
    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        is-square&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        &#10;        ">
      <div class="AdaptiveMedia-container">
          <div class="AdaptiveMedia-singlePhoto" style="padding-top: calc(0.5625 * 100% - 0.5px);">
    <div class="AdaptiveMedia-photoContainer js-adaptive-photo " data-image-url="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DStAq8dW4AAsPEZ.jpg" data-element-context="platform_photo_card" style="background-color:rgba(50,57,64,1.0);" data-dominant-color="[50,57,64]">

      <div class="AdaptiveMedia-container">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Chris Skidmore Retweeted Jeremy Corbyn</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Can't imagine why <a href="/jeremycorbyn" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="117777690"><s>@</s><b>jeremycorbyn</b></a> vehemently opposing reasonable measures to tackle electoral fraud that are commonplace across the world ... pilots will provide those without ID with opportunity to apply for alternative, and <a href="/ElectoralCommUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="43001521"><s>@</s><b>ElectoralCommUK</b></a> supportive of proposals<a href="https://t.co/OKPXMDEwRC" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/status/961295646975320065" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/status/961295646975320065"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/961295646975320065</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Chris Skidmore added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/jeremycorbyn/status/961295646975320065" data-conversation-id="961295646975320065" aria-hidden="true">

      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">

  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">One hundred years since womens suffrage, the Tories are trying to put up barriers to people exercising the right to vote.           <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Luke Hall MP Retweeted Michael Jaffrain</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Congratulations Maddie!<a href="https://t.co/lbEKxiKuaT" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/stbrendansfc/status/959395245116088321" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/stbrendansfc/status/959395245116088321"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/stbrendansfc/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/959395245116088321</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Luke Hall MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The decline in the elephant population fuelled by poaching for ivory shames our generation.       </div>

            <div class="AdaptiveMediaOuterContainer">
    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        is-square&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        &#10;        ">
      <div class="AdaptiveMedia-container">

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Was your MP amongst the 243 Labour MPs who voted to try and block the EU Withdrawal Bill which is essential for a smooth Brexit?

Tell them they must put the national interest above playing politics and respect the referendum result:<a href="https://t.co/52iePKgsnl" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://conservatives.com/respecttheresult" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://conservatives.com/respecttheresult"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">conservatives.com/respecttheresu</span><span class="invisible">lt</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Luke Hall MP Retweeted Glos Gazette</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I am working with South Gloucestershire Council and the National Deaf Children's Society to ensure provision of radio aids for deaf children in our schools. I will keep the community updated.<a href="https://t.co/WOVpIyoDaE" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/glosgazette/status/951783970118672384" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/glosgazette/status/951783970118672384"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/glosgazette/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/951783970118672384</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Luke Hall MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Kingsgate Park closed!

On the advice of a tree surgeon following a fallen limb from a tree due to winds in excess of 40-50mph, the decision has been taken to close Kingsgate Park today with immediate effect.  Apologies for any inconvenience this may cause. <a href="/hashtag/Newsflash?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Newsflash</b></a><a href="https://t.co/jdolTH0dHX" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/jdolTH0dHX</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">"It will make a massive difference for animals" - @BDCH's <a href="/CEO_Battersea" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1491499932"><s>@</s><b>CEO_Battersea</b></a>  responds to today's announcement that <a href="/michaelgove" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="748453510048518145"><s>@</s><b>michaelgove</b></a> has published a bill to strengthen <a href="/hashtag/animalwelfare?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>animalwelfare</b></a> and ensure <a href="/hashtag/animalsentience?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>animalsentience</b></a> is reflected in UK law. <a href="/hashtag/GreenBrexit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GreenBrexit</b></a> <a href="https://t.co/z7waZQ1Rco" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/environment-secretary-publishes-bill-to-strengthen-animal-welfare" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/environment-secretary-publishes-bill-to-strengthen-animal-welfare"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">gov.uk/government/new</span><span class="invisible">s/environment-secretary-publishes-bill-to-strengthen-animal-welfare</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/pIBO68REMf" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/pIBO68REMf</a></p>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/MattHancock" data-user-id="19825835">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/861889973674545152/Ike2P5bh_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Matt Hancock</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>MattHancock</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Excellent news this agreement has been secured. We now look forward to agreeing a positive trade and security relationship with the EU.<a href="https://t.co/f7dkFK129J" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/Number10gov/status/939029842158239744" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/Number10gov/status/939029842158239744"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/Number10gov/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/939029842158239744</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Theresa May Retweeted Clarence House</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I would like to offer my very warmest congratulations to HRH Prince Harry and Meghan Markle upon their engagement. 

This is a time of huge celebration for two people in love and, on behalf of myself, the Government and the country, I wish them great happiness for the future.<a href="https://t.co/Sfx76X98BW" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/clarencehouse/status/935085955383427072" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/clarencehouse/status/935085955383427072"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/clarencehouse/</span><span class="invisible">status/935085955383427072</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Thank you <a href="/LukeHall" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="4490851456"><s>@</s><b>LukeHall</b></a> for taking assembly today and helping us understand how accessible government is <a href="/hashtag/democracy?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>democracy</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/Parliament?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Parliament</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/prepschool?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>prepschool</b></a><a href="https://t.co/vHEmkf7jUa" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/vHEmkf7jUa</a></p>

    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Charles Walker absolutely right- Grant Shapps has no base in the party, completely out of touch. Many messages of support for <a href="/theresa_may" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="747807250819981312"><s>@</s><b>theresa_may</b></a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Luke Hall MP Retweeted Theresa May</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Determined, resilient performance from <a href="/theresa_may" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="747807250819981312"><s>@</s><b>theresa_may</b></a>. Passionate def. of free markets &amp; signal sent to house builders. Proud to serve you<a href="https://t.co/Vb2BumywyZ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/theresa_may/status/915567812831318016" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/theresa_may/status/915567812831318016"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/theresa_may/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/915567812831318016</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/LukeHall" data-user-id="4490851456">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/LukeHall" data-user-id="4490851456">

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
        <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedVideo" data-nav="embed_video">
          <button type="button" class="dropdown-link"> Embed Video</button>
        </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Thank you to everybody who supported me in this election. I look forward to continuing to serve as your local Member of Parliament.</p>
</div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/LukeHall" data-user-id="4490851456">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The US action was a completely appropriate response to a

      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards cards-forward&#10;" data-tweet-id="827561583916220416" data-item-id="827561583916220416" data-permalink-path="/BlueFoxCAFH/status/827561583916220416" data-conversation-id="827561583916220416" data-tweet-nonce="827561583916220416-ce3235b4-d87c-48e2-84a2-0dcdbe9f3795" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="827814545980801024" data-retweeter="LukeHall" data-screen-name="BlueFoxCAFH" data-name="Blue Fox" data-user-id="221062364" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="HoCpetitions LukeHallMP" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;221062364&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;BlueFoxCAFH&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Blue Fox&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Blue Fox&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Blue Fox&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;4490851456&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;LukeHall&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Luke Hall MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Luke Hall MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Luke Hall MP&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;3342596050&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;HoCpetitions&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Petitions Committee&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Petitions Committee&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Petitions Committee&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;865246951763136516&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;LukeHallMP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;LukeHallMP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;LukeHallMP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;LukeHallMP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary_large_image" data-has-cards="true">

      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="826457972586979330" id="stream-item-tweet-826457972586979330" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;826457972586979330&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">
    


  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="826457972586979330" data-item-id="826457972586979330" data-permalink-path="/LukeHall/status/826457972586979330" data-conversation-id="826457972586979330" data-tweet-nonce="826457972586979330-6a518070-ca8e-49f0-b9dd-ad5b5368e0a3" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="LukeHall" data-name="Luke Hall MP" data-user-id="4490851456" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;4490851456&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;LukeHall&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Luke Hall MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Luke Hall MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Luke Hall MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Luke Hall MP Retweeted Petitions Committee</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Petitions Committee has scheduled a debate relating to President Donald Trump's state visit to the UK<a href="https://t.co/4Z376j7tZq" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/HoCpetitions/status/826450243877269505" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/HoCpetitions/status/826450243877269505"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/HoCpetitions/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/826450243877269505</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Luke Hall MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/HoCpetitions/status/826450243877269505" data-conversation-id="826450243877269505" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="826450243877269505" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="HoCpetitions" data-user-id="3342596050" href="/HoCpetitions/status/826450243877269505" data-conversation-id="826450243877269505" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Petitions Committee</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>HoCpetitions</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">We have scheduled a <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>petition</b></span> debate on Mon 20 Feb relating to President Donald Trump's state visit to the UK. More details to follow.</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Action On Hearing Loss</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>ActionOnHearing</b></span></a>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Severn Crossing tolls to be slashed by up to 75% - 
Have your say on the proposed Severn Crossing toll reductions. <a href="https://t.co/XzGIzqxJJ7" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/severn-crossing-tolls-to-be-slashed-by-up-to-75" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/severn-crossing-tolls-to-be-slashed-by-up-to-75"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">gov.uk/government/new</span><span class="invisible">s/severn-crossing-tolls-to-be-slashed-by-up-to-75</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/UzMuZOK1m5" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/UzMuZOK1m5</a></p>

            <div class="AdaptiveMediaOuterContainer">
    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        is-square&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        &#10;        ">
      <div class="AdaptiveMedia-container">
          <div class="AdaptiveMedia-singlePhoto" style="padding-top: calc(0.5 * 100% - 0.5px);">
    <div class="AdaptiveMedia-photoContainer js-adaptive-photo " data-image-url="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/C2Cz8iZWIAE4YZR.jpg" data-element-context="platform_photo_card" style="background-color:rgba(10,59,64,1.0);" data-dominant-color="[10,59,64]">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Enjoyable morning at <a href="/ahpswickwar" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="4436839637"><s>@</s><b>ahpswickwar</b></a>, talking about life as an MP and answering questions about local issues in Wickwar</p>

    <div class="media-tagging-block">
    <a class="js-user-profile-link" href="/benhowlettuk" data-user-id="147734164" rel="noopener">Ben Howlett</a>,
  <a class="js-user-profile-link" href="/LukeHall" data-user-id="4490851456" rel="noopener">Luke Hall MP</a> and

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">2</span>

      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>

  </ul>
</div>

  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Really interesting piece from <a href="/LukeHallMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="865246951763136516"><s>@</s><b>LukeHallMP</b></a> on Sports Direct - v atypical article from an MP - in a good way!<a href="https://t.co/cnimPQeEXd" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/timesredbox/status/773438690018271232" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/timesredbox/status/773438690018271232"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/timesredbox/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/773438690018271232</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">2</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Thank you <a href="/David_Cameron" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="103065157"><s>@</s><b>David_Cameron</b></a> for the service you have given to our country. </div>

    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Luke Hall MP Retweeted Chris Skidmore</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Young MPs have signed this cross party letter arguing that we are <a href="/hashtag/strongerin?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>strongerin</b></a><a href="https://t.co/ujHqeanafJ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/cskidmoremp/status/745138634303508480" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/cskidmoremp/status/745138634303508480"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/cskidmoremp/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/745138634303508480</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Luke Hall MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--reply">

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">

      <span class="Icon Icon--small Icon--retweeted"></span>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       has-cards cards-forward&#10;" data-tweet-id="724526430709768192" data-item-id="724526430709768192" data-permalink-path="/LukeHall/status/724526430709768192" data-conversation-id="724526430709768192" data-tweet-nonce="724526430709768192-33512962-f869-4d64-ad92-0d9efe06ae17" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="LukeHall" data-name="Luke Hall MP" data-user-id="4490851456" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;4490851456&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;LukeHall&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Luke Hall MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Luke Hall MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Luke Hall MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary_large_image" data-has-cards="true">

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/LukeHall" data-user-id="4490851456">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/676707048994824196/IKC5JJEs_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Luke Hall MP</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>LukeHall</b></span></a>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">20</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/LukeHall" data-user-id="4490851456">

          <span class="Icon Icon--bird Icon--extraLarge"></span>
        </div>
        <h2 class="SignupDialog-heading">Not on Twitter? Sign up, tune into the things you care about, and get updates as they happen.</h2>
        <div class="SignupDialog-form">
<div class="signup SignupForm&#10;  ">
  <a href="https://twitter.com/signup" role="button" class="EdgeButton EdgeButton--large EdgeButton--primary SignupForm-submit u-block js-signup " data-component="dialog" data-element="signup">Sign up</a>
</div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="SignupDialog-footer modal-footer u-textCenter">
        Have an account? <a class="SignupDialog-signinLink" href="/login" rel="noopener">Log in </a>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
